title: The Silly Bastards Behind the Modern Fascist Movement
itunes:title: The Silly Bastards Behind the Modern Fascist Movement
description:
Robert is joined by Bridget Todd, Hannah Ettinger, and Nicholas Wood for a special bonus episode that looks into the modern American nazi movement and their methods.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
